name: Pronouns Of None In English Quiz
name_original: Pronouns Of None In English Quiz
description:
In your modern world population less and less read book and 

re-learn past school subjects, which may get skills and useful

congition. Specially people is wrost knows your language. 

After all without addiational rules your language became to

recondity and poor understood, the foregin people just don't

understand you. Then means is refine your language. Modern

dirty language turn into perfect language of 19XX and 18XX.

Need a remember some forgetten rules of your language.

And this rule "Negative Pronouns meaning people" or abbrivated

"Pronouns of None". We are line up only big part of the rule of

pronouns pointing on people but not inanimate object, because

this is most studied theme in the schools. 

Essense of the game is choose correct answer of question-sentence.

Need is choose a lost word, which tagged a ellipsis. To know correct answer,

necessary to know rules of the pronoun. The game is full of text samples.

But main feature in the game - is time. Then more learn as big time -

than more you are know this rule in the english language. For the

pupils and unbooked gamers we're recommend this game!

*Features of game*

- The intensive gameplay and timer, which must hurry up player!

- 35 different sentences-examples-questions! Some sentences are actual!

- The original soundtrack (In that i'am write them myself!)

- The justice player's rank system, so may be compare yourself to someone...

Your century is nightmare imagination, our century is clever reality.

So you are must smart than other!
